name: Underground Climber
description:
How does your submission match the theme? 

You control a lost miner, who uses his mining tool as a weapon and as a resource to traverse  the mysterious cave.

Third-party resources Unity3D, Corgi Engine, Photoshop, bfxr, http://www.beepbox.com/

Contributors: 

Carlos Zaracho (dragonfang) - Programmer, designer

Lia Aquino (liark2z) - Artist, Sound Design, Music
